title: Why do I have to connect my Pixel 5 to a paired Bluetooth device manually every time I try to use it
content: Every time I try to use Bluetooth on my Pixel 5 it will not connect automatically I have to do it manually it doesn't matter if it's my car it doesn't matter if it's my home minis or if it's my nest it's got all of these remembered for over 6 months now but it will not connect unless I make it connect
